testcase.name: Add to Cart and Verify Items
Checkout and Payment
testcase.system-out: Given User is on Login Page.................................................passed When User entered "<username>" and "<pass>".................................passed Then User is on product page................................................passed Given User is on cart.......................................................passed When User click on checkout button..........................................passed And User enter checkout info................................................passed And User click on continue button...........................................passed And User click on Finish....................................................passed Then User is on successfull order Page.....................................passed
